description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Fish Squid Time Machine is scary and loud. Also the controller often vibrates. I hear that's called rumbling. There is a donkey. I'm not sure why. I have heard that you control the fish squid, but this is not readily apparent." - Lan , doesn't play games, age 30.  FSTM interbreeds the Fishie Fishie and SYNSO series, for www.indiekombat.com. Each button controls a different player.  FSTM <3 U
